name: Rise (itch) (BlueFireFlyStudio)
description:
Gameplay

The lava is rising and there is nowhere to go but up! But be careful, one missed step and its over! Rise as fast  as you can and stay ahead of the rising lava while collecting coins along the way and unlocking new players. How far can you go? 

Controls

A simple drag and release game. 

Features 

  • Unlockable characters 
  • Endless hours of stressful gameplay (if you can manage it)
